actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To provide for a notice and comment period before the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection issues guidance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Bureau Guidance Transparency Act - Amends the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to direct the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB), before issuing any guidance, to: (1) provide for a public notice and comment period before issuing the guidance in final form; and (2) make available to the public, when issuing guidance in final form, all studies, data, and other analysis relied upon by the CFPB in preparing and issuing such guidance.

titles.title: To provide for a notice and comment period before the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection issues guidance, and for other purposes.
